subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kazuo Matsui’s two-run single fueled a seven-run fourth inning for the Houston Astros on Wednesday night in a 9-3 victory over the Reds in Cincinnati.
snippet: Kazuo Matsui’s two-run single fueled a seven-run fourth inning for the Houston Astros on Wednesday night in a 9-3 victory over the Reds in Cincinnati.
